#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <vector>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
 
using namespace std;
 
string multiply(string s1,string s2){
string s;
int i,j,k,l,m,c,sz1=s1.length(),sz2=s2.length();
for(i=0;i<sz1+sz2;i++) s+="0";
char ch;
for(i=sz2-1;i>=0;i--){
c=0;
for(j=sz1-1;j>=0;j--){
m=(s2[i]-'0')*(s1[j]-'0')+c+s[sz1-j-1+sz2-i-1]-'0';
c=m/10;
m%=10;
s[sz1-j-1+sz2-i-1]=(char)(m+'0');
}
if(c>0)
s[sz1-j-1+sz2-i-1]=(char)((s[sz1-j-1+sz2-i-1]-'0'+c)+'0');
}
i=sz1+sz2-1;
while(s[i]=='0'){
s.erase(s.begin()+i);
i--;
}
reverse(s.begin(),s.end());
return s;
}
 
int main(){
int i, j, n, t;
cin >> n;
string s, s1, s2;
vector <string> v;
for(i = 0; i < n; i++){
cin >> s;
s1 = "";
t = 0;
for(j = 0; j < s.size(); j++){
if(s[j] == 'X' || s[j] == 'x'){
v.push_back(s1);
s1 = "";
}
else
s1 = s1 + s[j];
}
v.push_back(s1);
if(v.size() == 1){
	for(j = (v[0].size() - 1); j >= 0; j--){
		if(v[0][j] != '0'){
			cout << v[0][j] << endl;
			t = 1;
			break;
		}
	}
}
else{
s2 = multiply(v[0], v[1]);
for(j = 2; j < v.size(); j++)
s2 = multiply(s2, v[j]);
for(j = (s2.size() - 1); j >= 0; j--){
if(s2[j] != '0'){
cout << s2[j] << endl;
t = 1;
break;
}
}
}
if(t == 0)
cout << "Robot hanged." << endl;
v.clear();
}
 
return 0;
}
